title: Case 1
description: Orders for the 1st Jewish Infantry Battalion, 02/13/1918-04/04/1918, 132 sheets.

title: Case 2
description: Draft orders for the 1st Jewish infantry battalion, February 13, 1918-April 7, 1918, 62 sheets.

title: Case 3
description: The case of the murder of soldier M. Burkovetskyi by M. Boganov, clerk of the headquarters of the 1st Jewish battalion (reports, telephone messages, etc.), 03/24/1918-03/25/1918, 8 sheets.

title: Case 4
description: Reports on appointment and release of soldiers, 28.02.1918-21.03.1918, 83 sheets.

title: Case 5
description: Certificates of officers of regiments, 24.08.1917-28.02.1918, 9 sheets.

title: Case 6
description: Certificates, certificates, passports of soldiers of regiments, etc., 1918, 135 sheets.

title: Case 7
description: Demobilization certificates of soldiers of the 1st Jewish infantry battalion, 04/01/1918-04/15/1918, 113 sheets.

title: Case 8
description: Alphabetical book of soldiers of the 1st Jewish infantry battalion, 1918, 26 sheets.

title: Case 9
description: Certificate and list of members of the liquidation commission for the demobilization of the 1st Jewish infantry battalion, 30.03.1918-21.05.1918, 17 sheets.
